user.description:
API key can be retrieved automatically if login credentials were not set in application.
Your API key can be found in Settings > General in the Radarr Web UI.

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Radarr integration needs to be manually re-authenticated with the Radarr API

error.zeroconf_failed: API key not found. Please enter it manually
error.wrong_app: Incorrect application reached. Please try again

data.upcoming_days: Number of upcoming days to display
